definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: flow, trickle, drop, distil (poet.) (Targum [[נְזַל]] of flowing water ; Syr. nzl descendit, defluet PS:2331; Ar. nazala descend (.milk into udder, but also in gen.));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[נׇֽזְלוּ]] Ju Jdg 5:5; Impf. [[יִזַּל]] Nu 24:7 etc; Pt. [[נׁזְלִים]]Ex 15:8 +, etc.;—

flow subj. water, Nu 24:7 (JE); Ps 147:18; cf. Je 18:14; subj. clouds, Job 36:28 sq. rain as acc. mat. Ges:§ 117 z (‖[[רעף]] and, v:Job 36:27, [[זקק]]), cf. Je 9:17 (of eyelids); so .fig. Is 45:8 sq. [[חֶדֶק]] (‖[[רעף]]); of mts. (i.e. their torrents) Ju Jdg 5:6 acc. to Vulgate Ew GFM al., but v. I. [[זלל]] esp. pt. as subst., = streams, floods, Ex 15:8 (‖[[מים]], [[תהום]] of Red Sea); Ps 78:44 (‖[[יְאׂר]]); for drinking Ps 78:16 (‖[[מים כַנהרות]], [[תהום]] v:Ps 78:15), Pr 5:15 out of well (‖[[מים]]); for irrigation Is 44:3 (‖[[מים]]); fig. of Shulamite [[מִן־לְבָנוֹן]] ´[[נ]] Ct So 4:15 (‖[[מעין גנים]], [[באר מים]])
distil, of spices [[בְּשָׂמִים]] Ct So 4:16; fig. of words, like dew De 32:2 (‖[[ערף]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. lyZIhi Is 48:21 cause to flow, water from rock (‖[[זוב]]).—Vid. also I. [[זלל]].
